thread.title: BRIEF-General Dynamics Selected To Support The U.S. Army Intelligence And Security Command

title: BRIEF-General Dynamics Selected To Support The U.S. Army Intelligence And Security Command

organizations.name: army intelligence and security command reuters

text:
April 18, 2018 / 6:05 PM / Updated 26 minutes ago BRIEF-General Dynamics Selected To Support The U.S. Army Intelligence And Security Command Reuters Staff 
April 18 (Reuters) - GENERAL DYNAMICS INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY : 
* GENERAL DYNAMICS SELECTED TO SUPPORT THE U.S. ARMY INTELLIGENCE AND SECURITY COMMAND 
* GENERAL DYNAMICS INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY - SINGLE-AWARD TASK ORDER CONTRACT HAS A POTENTIAL VALUE OF APPROXIMATELY $300 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
